  "lastChapter": "##og:novel:latest_chapter_name\" content=\"([^\"]+)##$1###",
  "name": "##og:novel:book_name\" content=\"([^\"]+)##$1###"
}

ruleSearch:
{ "author": "$4", "bookList": ":
\\d+

([^<]+)

([^|]+) \\| 作者：([^<]+)

[^<]+([^<]+)

", "bookUrl": "$1", "coverUrl": "@js:'https://timgsa.baidu.com/timg?image&quality=80&size=b9999_10000&sec=1566993525545&di=0a849b5b0e4aa867d25cab809088a7b6&imgtype=0&src=http%3A%2F%2Fpic2.zhimg.com%2Fv2-5218f28cd54360d2da19cfca807525c9_b.jpg'", "kind": "$3", "lastChapter": "$5", "name": "$2" }
